snippet.title: Blue Dragon Awakened Shadow - NDS - Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Blue Dragon the epic RPG for DS  is the latest title developed by tri-Crescendo, creators of Eternal Sonata. This exclusive video produced for the E3, shows how you can customize your own hero, take part in fast paced real-time battles in solo mode or with friends!

Blue Dragon will be released on 24th September 2010

For more information, visit: http://www.namcobandaigames.eu
